alert.note: Alert for Jasper (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued November 29 at 6:13PM CST until November 29 at 7:15PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southern Jasper County in east central Mississippi... * Until 715 PM CST. * At 613 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Hebron, or 7 miles southwest of Stringer, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Stringer around 625 PM CST. Moss around 630 PM CST. Vernon around 640 PM CST. Paulding around 700 PM CST. Orange around 715 PM CST. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
